text:
@senatemajldr Here is where the money went for "Small Businesses" https://t.co/NTsRP1vmev
Schumer is right to demand specificity and oversight.  You gave 350B away to your corporate buddies and the truly small business didn't get anything. @SenSchumer @SpeakerPelosi @senatemajldr
